attributes.action: Pressuring Cypriot Leaders in order to Reach For an Agreement for the Cyprus Problem as a guaranteeing partner
attributes.additional_details: UK Government has to actively involve more in the Cyprus negotiations process as a guaranteeing power, calling for the other guaranteeing countries (Greece and Turkey) for an international conference, pressurizing the leaders and play her own role as a former-colonial power in order to bring long lasting solution and a viable settlement in the Cyprus problem
